replies.bodyText: Ah... ok. That's probably not a great assumption, but fine.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Could we instead make use of the Apache Commons Collections version of this class and method?
timeline.author: ibacher
ibacher
ibacher

replies.bodyText: Note that this also eliminates the need for the isNotEmpty() check as a null or empty value will result in the default value.
